title: Album Stream: David Bowie – The Next Day
body:
My girlfriend had an early start this morning, by default so did I.

However, as I sit drinking my first coffee of the day I’m increasingly glad she woke me as she bumbled about, clumsily gathering her shit. The world has a new **David Bowie** LP, and that guys, is something to wake up.

_The Next Day_ will drop on 11 March, until then stream the whole thing [HERE.](http://search.itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZContentLink.woa/wa/link?path=DavidBowie)

1.  The Next Day
2.  Dirty Boys
3.  The Stars (Are Out Tonight)
4.  Love Is Lost
5.  Where Are We Now?
6.  Valentine’s Day
7.  If You Can See Me
8.  I’d Rather Be High
9.  Boss of Me
10.  Dancing Out in Space
11.  How Does the Grass Grow
12.  (You Will) Set the World On Fire
13.  You Feel So Lonely You Could Die
14.  Heat
